OOC:  YOU BIG FAT LING b*)(h NECROMANCER WAS C.
WOLF'S!

--- LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote:
> OOC:  Hey, watch it there.  (This is not intended to
> be a flame)  First of
> all, I just wanted to have an interesting entrance,
> you know, make  people
> notice.  Also, as for Skulletron/Slaughter having
> potential, that is a big
> understatement, if you look  back on the olden days 
>  of NBWRPG(the better
> days) I had the "potential" to be one of the top
> RPers.  As I have ranted on
> about before, I am nowhere  near to being new to
> this RPG.  But thank you
> for the compliment, Skulletron was my first
> character, and this is the.....
> 3rd time, I believe....that I have brought him back.
>  I have always taken my
> characters seriously, and unlike my buddy Hollywood
> Narrator over there(this
> is not an insult  to you, HN) I always do "serious"
> characters.  Some of my
> best works include Skulletron, Decadel, Necromancer,
> Hell Drak, and.....
> actually, I consider just about all of my old
> characters to be good works. 
> I am also impressed with the characters and plots I
> see now, and I look
> forward to bringing back old characters, debuting
> brand new ones,  and
> interacting with you guys...
> 
> -------Original Message-------
> 
> From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Date: August 05, 2002 07:48:16 AM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: ooC: people...
> 
> I'll stop when they do.  But Rauq, even you have to
> admit that HNC's 
> inaugural rp post wasn't worth the time it took to
> read the first 
> line, let alone the whole thing.  And Lurker's
> start-up is the most 
> over-dramatized entrance I've ever seen - all you
> need is a shot of 
> Dr. Frankenstein throwing a switch and it's a ripoff
> of every single 
> horror movie out there.  
> 
> It's improved somewhat since then.
> 
> As far as characters are concerned, Terminion and 
> Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both
> personality and 
> potential.  The remaining four have been
> cannon-fodder thus far.
> 
> That's my opinion and it's up to you guys to prove
> me right or wrong 
> by roleplaying, not bitching.  And this is a serious
> RPG, not a 
> slapstick movie, so if I see another post/exchange
> like HNC's first 
> one, where everyone involved is an absolute idiot, I
> will ingore 
> every post thereafter made by the perpetrator(s)
> regardless of who 
> they are or think they are.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...>
> wrote:
> > I've been lurking around for those wondering.
> Megatron is waiting 
> in

> are 'busy' or

> right now, but I 
> > still have to read the posts up till when i last
> checked em.
> > 
> > I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this
> obviously aint 
> > getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal
> shields*
> > 
> > First think that needs to happen is a cease fire
> in this flame war

> wrong right from 
> > the start. certain things which shouldn't have
> been said, were 
> said, 
> > and the replies were less than sucessful at
> defusing the situation 
> > and it blew up. 
> > 
> > cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting
> style, that's your 
> > problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with
> a bunch of 
> > senseless slander isn't going to make him post the
> way you'd like 
> > him to post.
> > 
> > Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting,
> if you want to say 
> > something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it

> shit' and 'grow up'
